ygData.subject: RE: soloing
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yeah, hehe. ... Hmm, oops... you said the word twist and someone doesn t like that on the list.  So, rather can I harmonize jig and clarity?  Probably
ygData.messageBody:
>ok, ok, so you mean you _used_ to do this - hehehe...

Yeah, hehe.

>does jig twist with clarity <eg> (hey I am on a roll!)

Hmm, oops... you said the word 'twist' and someone doesn't
like that on the list. So, rather can I harmonize jig and
clarity? Probably not, because that will give the bard a
bad name and I will be misinforming people... badda boom. =)
But my STR isn't high enough yet to lift my lute, I'll get
back to you when I have 142 strength. <chuckle>

oh man, I can see the reposts (riposte hehe) now.
(no offense people, jk)

Harmonic Distortion, 38th unchained melody.
League of Antonican Bards, The Wind Spirit's Song
< Keepers of Norrath > Innoruuk
